about_the_game:
A short story that nobody has called "brilliant", featuring the character Lord Loomy. Comes in PDF form.

It follows Lord Loomy as he conducts a wondrous and remarkable investigation that will leave your jaw on the floor. Countless twists and turns, surprises, and subversions. It's probably the greatest detective story ever written.
